attributes.action: Allow taxpayers to opt out of funding the Royal Family and choose to donate that money to a cause of their choosing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rather than pay 66p each towards the funding of a Royal Family those of use who  choose to do so should be allowed to nominate a different cause to which our 66p would be contributed, such as charities, hospitals or schools.
